languages.text: {n}Офицеры взрываются возмущенными криками, обещающими мучительную смерть каждому коварному ксеносу, что встретится на их пути. Равор качает головой:{/n} "У ксеносов нет души и совести. Все они от природы — бесчестные выродки и предатели".

{n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."
languages.original_text: {n}Офицеры взрываются возмущенными криками, обещающими мучительную смерть каждому коварному ксеносу, что встретится на их пути. Равор качает головой:{/n} "У ксеносов нет души и совести. Все они от природы — бесчестные выродки и предатели".

traits.locale_text: {n}The officers burst into indignant shouts that promise death to any devious xenos who ever crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable miscreants and traitors by nature."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}The officers burst into indignant shouts that promise death to any devious xenos who ever crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable miscreants and traitors by nature."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Los oficiales prorrumpen en exclamaciones de indignación, jurando matar a todo xenos traicionero que se cruce en su camino. Ravor menea la cabeza.{/n} «Los xenos no tienen alma ni conciencia. Son innobles, degenerados y traidores por naturaleza».
languages.original_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los oficiales prorrumpen en exclamaciones de indignación, jurando matar a todo xenos traicionero que se cruce en su camino. Ravor menea la cabeza.{/n} «Los xenos no tienen alma ni conciencia. Son innobles, degenerados y traidores por naturaleza».
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}军官之中爆发出了愤怒的怒吼声，发誓要杀掉他们遇到的每位奸诈异形。雷沃摇了摇头。{/n}“异形没有灵魂，没有良心。他们本质上就是堕落的怪物，是可鄙的叛徒。”
languages.original_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}军官之中爆发出了愤怒的怒吼声，发誓要杀掉他们遇到的每位奸诈异形。雷沃摇了摇头。{/n}“异形没有灵魂，没有良心。他们本质上就是堕落的怪物，是可鄙的叛徒。”
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Les officiers poussent des hurlements indignés, promettant de tuer tout xénos qui croiserait leur chemin. Ravor secoue la tête.{/n} « Les xénos n'ont ni âme ni conscience. Ce sont, par nature, des dégénérés qui ne connaissent pas l'honneur et n'hésitent pas à trahir. »
languages.original_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les officiers poussent des hurlements indignés, promettant de tuer tout xénos qui croiserait leur chemin. Ravor secoue la tête.{/n} « Les xénos n'ont ni âme ni conscience. Ce sont, par nature, des dégénérés qui ne connaissent pas l'honneur et n'hésitent pas à trahir. »
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}士官たちは憤怒の叫びを上げ、自分たちの道行を妨げる、裏切り者の異種族に死を約束する。ラヴォアは首を振る。{/n}「異種族には魂も良心もない。彼らはその性質上、不名誉な堕落者であり裏切り者なのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官たちは憤怒の叫びを上げ、自分たちの道行を妨げる、裏切り者の異種族に死を約束する。ラヴォアは首を振る。{/n}「異種族には魂も良心もない。彼らはその性質上、不名誉な堕落者であり裏切り者なのだ」
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Die Offiziere brechen in entrüstetes Geschrei aus und versprechen jedem verräterischen Xenos, der jemals ihren Weg kreuzt, den Tod. Ravor schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Xenos haben weder Seele noch Gewissen. Sie sind ehrlose Degenerierte und von Natur aus Verräter."
languages.original_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Offiziere brechen in entrüstetes Geschrei aus und versprechen jedem verräterischen Xenos, der jemals ihren Weg kreuzt, den Tod. Ravor schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Xenos haben weder Seele noch Gewissen. Sie sind ehrlose Degenerierte und von Natur aus Verräter."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Öfkeyle bağıran subaylar, yollarına çıkan tüm hain zenoları öldürmeye yemin ediyor. Ravor başını sallıyor.{/n} "Zenoların ruhu ve bilinci yoktur. Hepsi doğuştan onursuz, yoz ve haindir."
languages.original_text: {n}The officers erupt into indignant shouts, promising death to any treacherous xenos that crosses their path. Ravor shakes his head.{/n} "Xenos have no souls and no conscience. They are dishonourable degenerates and traitors by their very nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Subaylar öfkeyle bağırıyor, yollarına çıkan tüm hain zenoları öldürmeye yemin ediyorlar. Ravor başını sallıyor.{/n} "Zenoların ruhu ve bilinci yoktur. Onların hepsi doğuştan birer onursuz yozlaşmış ve haindir."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster
